section.name: Table of Contents
section.p: This page displays the current tasks and features that need to be done. Each task or features might be assigned to a specific future release.
Note that bugs are not maintained here - if you want to file a bug, please use our issue managementsystem, or post to one of our mailing lists.

section.name: Most wanted
section.p: Features we want to (eventually) support in the IDEA plugin (note: some of these features might not even make it to the 1.0 release):

tr.td: Bidirectional update between IDEA project and POM

Transparent bi-directional synchronization between the POM file and the IDEA project files including:
Libraries synchronization
Descriptive features synchronization
Conflict resolution
Editor should support editing POM descriptive features (such as homepage, issue-tracking URL, etc) as well as dependencies, SCM versions, and build settings.
Provide a POM text editor, for those who prefer to hand-code the POM. It should be a simple text editor, with Jelly namespace recognition as schemas, as well as smart goal autocomplete.
New IDEA project from POM file
Add "New project from POM" action (think about using the Maven IDEA plugin to generate the IDEA files - if so, it needs improvements).
Autolaunch Maven goals on predefined IDEA events

Allow user to attach Maven goal execution to IDEA events such as compilation, save, run, debug, etc. Allow specifying the timing of preferred execution (before, after or replace). We should also provide sensible defaults for this (but only after user saw them - as this can cause unwanted results if defaults are wrong).

Automatically download required artifacts and/or dependencies. Assuming the dependencies and IDEA libraries are synchronized, we should always initiate a dependency update on project open or when initiated by the user, to make sure project compiles in the IDE to the correct classpath.
Allow local and remote repository browsing and search. We should also support user-initiated artifact downloads from the browsed repositories (if remote).
Add a "Create POM file from project" action, to create a POM file from an existing IDEA project.

Add option for viewing the help for a specific goal. We should display both a Javadoc-like tooltip window showing the help for the goal from the plugin's site in the goals.html link, as well as the standard goal description (just in case).
Allow showing the project help screen (like "maven -u").

Add a new IDEA project type - "Maven Plugin". This will make creating Maven plugins a snap. Project type should automaticaly create the appropriate project.xml, plugin.properties, project.properties, resources, etc for the developer. Also automatically activate "plugin:install" before, run or debug, and other thinkable gadgets.

A sophisticated WYSIWYG editor for Maven XDocs for easy documentation writing. If too complex (this can be a very complex job!) we should at least provide a nice user-friendly text editor, that has a panel with appropriate text fields for author name(s), email, document properties, document title, etc.

An integration and UI for the Continuum (Maven's Continuos Integration tool). Possible features could be:
Deploy project to Continuum
Check project status
Trigger builds
Ideas are welcome ;-)

section.name: Enhancements
section.p: These are smaller enhancements and minor new features we want to implement in the IDEA plugin:

tr.td: Allow automatic execution console close if no errors occured
Allow the user to specify that the execution console will be automatically closed if no errors occur during the execution.
Placing goals on toolbar and menus
Allow adding goals to the IDEA toolbar and menus.
Support goal searching in goals tool window
Due to the vast amount of Maven plugins, it would be nice if the user could search the goals list.
(Done) We should show goal descriptions in both the goals tool window and the favorite goals selection settings dialog.
Ask user to attach a POM on project open, if no POM is attached

A nice feature could be to check on project open if there are IDEA modules that have no POM attached to them, and if so - display a dialog to the user about it, and allow her/him to open the module settings dialog for POM selection. We should add a "Never ask me again" checkbox, if this gets annoying ;-)
Show favorite goals on relevant context menus
Show favorite goals in the context menus. The goals should be the favorite goals of the module to which the file clicked belongs to.
Show maven.xml structure in structure pane

When the selected file in the project pane/editor is maven.xml, show its structure more visually - e.g. list of defined goals, list of defined goal hooks (preGoal/postGoal), etc. Link to source automatically when double clicked.
Automatic license download on project creation/open

Check if project has a LICENSE.txt file, and if not, prompt the user and allow him/her to download a license from a predefined list of known license (allow adding more licenses in the future). Also set the <license> tag in the POM. Display a "Never ask me again" checkbox if this gets annoying ;-)
Add Maven plugin tips to IDEA startup tips
Integrate into IDEA's startup tips mechanism and displays various Maven-plugin related feature tips.

section.name: Documentation
section.p: Tasks to be done in the project documentation:

tr.td: Add a JIRA report to the site
Automatically generate a JIRA report for the site.

Since the Maven xdocs plugin's downloads report that not generate links to the SNAPSHOTs releases, we should allow users to download these as well (especially until we release 0.1). This can be done by adding a link to
http://dist.codehaus.org/mevenide/distributionsin the index page.
Create and add some screenshots of the plugin to the site (either index page or a special "Screenshots" link).
